name: stitched up make up scrubbies
notes:
this make up scrubbies pattern includes instructions for two sizes, one approx. 6.5cm/2.5" for a small scrubbie and 9.5cm/3.5" for a larger scrubbie.

it is ideal for a beginner or confident beginner, with plenty of step by step photos.
stitches used are - 
(us) ss, ch, sc, puff stitch (incudes a written instruction) and magic circle. 
(uk) ss, ch, dc, puff stitch (incudes a written instruction) and magic circle. 

i have used drops paris aran weight yarn for my scrubbies, with a 4.5mm hook but you could use any aran/worsted cotton yarn to achieve a similar result.  you could also use a different weight yarn, just use a half size smaller hook than that recommended by your yarn to ensure it is tight enough.

if you have any questions please contact me, i am more than happy to help (both before and after pattern purchase!). 
this pattern has been tried and thoroughly tested but if you have any issues please let me know. 

also available free with registration on crochet society website, where it is worked with dk yarn and size f (3.75 mm) hook.
